TextView.android:text: Is the centre located at the same address as mentioned on SDMS?
Is the Infrastructure (No. of classrooms, State of Laboratories, etc.) present at the Training Center adequate and satisfactory to conduct the training?
Is the assessment being conducted at same centre, where trainees got trained?
Assessment is conducted on the Scheduled Date?
If No , Reasons for change of Date?
Are the Trainees being assessed for same job role, for which they were trained?
Each Trainee’s identity checked before conducting assessment?
Are the trainees confirming that they paid the Assessment Fee?
Are the trainees aware they are enrolled under PMKVY Scheme?
Are the trainees aware of the Certification Process?
Are the trainees aware of Reward Disbursement?
Are the trainees aware of the Course fee?
Are the trainees aware of Auto Debit Facility?
Are the trainees aware of the Placement opportunities?
Trainee Feedback form available, and signed by the trainee?
Trainee Attendance Record Available, and signed by the trainees?
Trainees Enrolment Forms available, with PMKVY logo and PMKVY Disclaimer? Are the forms signed by trainees?
Are the names on Enrolment forms tallying with the Attendance records of the batch (check any 5 forms)
Are the trainees given a PMKVY booklet/Pamphlet for information?
Posters of PMKVY displayed in Counseling room?
Posters of PMKVY displayed in Classroom?
PMKVY signage displayed outside the Center?

CheckBox.android:text: I hereby confirm that details filled above are thoroughly checked by undersigned
